MASTER_DATABASE_URL.description: DATABASE_URL value from main API application deployed on Heroku

S3_REPORTING_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of the storage bucket to use on AWS S3

NOMIS_CLIENT_ID.description: User ID to authenticate with for NOMIS API

NOMIS_CLIENT_SECRET.description: User secret to authenticate with for NOMIS API

NOMIS_AUTH_SCHEME.description: Authentication scheme to use with NOMIS API

NOMIS_PRISON_API_PATH_PREFIX.description: Namespace for general NOMIS API endpoints

HEROKU_DISABLE_AUTH.description: Disable authentication on Heroku review apps if true

scripts.postdeploy: pg_dump $MASTER_DATABASE_URL | psql $DATABASE_URL && bundle exec rails db:migrate
